resources.string:
A Computer Programmer, worked with Loopback, Node JS, MongoDB, Javascript, HTML, CSS and Python and has a basic knowledge of C++. Actively looking for a job that challenges and helps me improve my analytical problem-solving abilities and experience in my craft.



 I am a self-proficient and passionate individual with following professional skills.

 • Extensive development of Web Applications using Node JS, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Jquery and AJAX.

 • Experience with Scripting languages such as JavaScript, JQuery for client-side scripting.

 • Extensive understanding in creating Models, Views, Partials in Node JS.

 • Experienced Knowledge on different Authentications such as Form-based Authentication and role-based Authentication.

 • Experience with Test-Driven Development (TDD) using Mocha and Assertion libraries like Chai.js.

 • Experience in using Source control - GIT and I use Source Tree along with GIT
